messages.body: $AAPL individuals buying weekly or nearby calls be very careful or only risk an amount you wont loose your sleep for. Apple will report a record sales quarter.  Just look back 3 months ago when $AMZN reported record sales quarter. I bet huge on that for $AMZN and it made me loose my shirt.  I recovered significant amount of that loss ever since.  Just be careful if you think stocks only go up since March 2020.  In the end it will be very painful for majority of individuals bcuz the big players will slowly cash out.  But I’m secretly wishing for bitcoin like rally in stocks before any major fall.  :)  If there is that kind of rally I will be out of stocks for next 4 years lol

links.description: Description : Apple, Inc. engages in the design, manufacture, and sale of smartphones, personal computers, tablets, wearables and accessories, and other variety of related services. It operates through the following geographical segments: Americas, Europe, Greater China, Japan, and Rest of Asia Pacific. The Americas segment includes North and South America.
